home.title: Welcome to Azgzaw.
home.subtitle: With Azgzaw, establish a spirit of cooperation and solidarity and reduce emissions of toxic gases.

link.goal1: Plant ten million tree per year.
link.goal2: Reducing  Co2 Emissions  And Toxic Gases.
link.goal3: Save paper, plastic, leather, Minimize production and decrease the purchase and sale of products that we do not need.
